title: Bay Area Pandemic Dashboard (BAPD) Open Database
description: This site is an extension of Code for San Francisco's Bay Area Pandemic Dashboard. You can explore the data behind the dashboard, write queries using SQL, or download the data sets in different formats. This site uses Datasette to present the data. For more information on how to use Datasette, visit https://datasette.io/. To see how this database was created, check out the project on GitHub: https://github.com/benghancock/covid19-sfbayarea-opendb
